Body.string:
Every Claptrap reaches a point in their planned obsolescence where they straighten up, find another electrical device, and settle down. Unfortunately, there aren't any other CL4P-TP units... so you'll just have to help Claptrap build a soulmate.

Find parts from CL4P-TP units scattered across the universe to help Claptrap... find happiness? Create life? Build love? Yeah, let’s go with that.
